Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Westbound Reroute near Addison/Marmora
ShortDescription: Westbound 152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted via Addison, Central, Belmont, Austin and Addison: due to, street blockage near Addison/Marmora.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted via Addison, Central, Belmont, Austin and Addison: due to, street blockage near Addison/Marmora.
